attributes.action: Allow under age UK citizens to add there votes to the EU referendum.
attributes.background: On the 23rd of June 2016 we voted to leave the EU. This was won by just 1.9%. Many people who were to young to vote in this referendum do not agree with its outcome. I believe that we deserve a say in our future. Please sign below if you agree.

rejection.details: The term "under age" is vague, making it unclear what the Government is being asked to do.
